snippet.title: The Sentient Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
The Sentient is a challenging space exploration simulation game where everything in space is currently a mystery.  You play as the first and only Sentient artificial intelligence able to make quick decisions and help guide the human race.

Travel and explore various galaxies and sectors of space while attempting to bring research back to Earth.  The more research you bring back the better equipped your equipment will become and will provide you with a greater means to survive. 

Learn more on our website: http://www.the-sentient.com/
Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/uncagedstudios
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/uncagedstudios
